participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Reflective and caring, often enjoys deep conversations.
participant_1.background: i spent a decade working in the human services field. my father used to work for home depot. i've a son who is in junior high school. horror movies are my favorites.

participant_2.background: my favorite singer is taylor swift. i love eating out with friends. i'm getting married in the spring. i work at a school as a kindergarten teacher. i'm 24 years old.
